title: Skin I was gifted disappeared?
body: Sorry, I dont usually use this website so I dont know if this is the right place to post this (if it isnt can someone tell me what to do instead), but my friend The OG Scout gifted me debonair jayce a long time ago (maybe like 6 months or something) and I just recently realized that it says I do not own it anymore. I dont know why this happened or if it was intentional or not. I have not contacted him because I feel a bit rude if I asked what happened to my skin and he maybe refunded it or something, so I just want to know what happened. Thank you.

replies.body: That'd be pretty upsetting to see a skin gift randomly stop working =\ . I went ahead and looked over your purchase/gift history, and it does show that the Debonair Jayce skin was refunded by the person who sent it.
I thought you couldn't refund gifts. Or has the refund policy for gifts been updated recently?
In very specific cases it can be done. I can't go into too many details, but in cases where fraud is concerned, we might be able to help!
So he gifted the skin illegally? I thought he just wanted the rp back for himself or something lol. I dont know which is worse XD
aw lol rip i guess im just not loved anymore XD. thank you for checking though
